name: BLOONS
description:
BLOONS is an exciting puzzle game based on the simple fact that popping balloons is fun. Pop your way through dozens of puzzling levels in this exciting puzzle adventure. Each level will have a different arrangement of balloons, try and pop as many as you can with the darts you are given. Look out for special balloons, blocks and darts, and have fun discovering what they do.
